sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, View,Image,TextInput, } from 'react-native'
import LogoName from "../../component/LogoName/index"
import Button from "../../component/Button/index"
import { TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native-gesture-handler'
import { useState } from 'react'

const index = ({navigation}) => {
    const [userName,setuserName]=useState("")
    console.log(userName)
    return (
        <>
        <View style={{flex:1,alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",backgroundColor:"#430064",height:"100%"}}>
            <Image
            source={require("../../assets/logo.png") }
            style={{height:330,width:350}}
            />

            <View style={{backgroundColor:"white",width:320,padding:10,alignItems:"center",borderRadius:20}}>
                <TextInput onChange={(userName)=>{setuserName(userName)}} style={{fontSize:19}} placeholder="Enter UserName"  />
            </View>
            <View style={{backgroundColor:"white",width:320,padding:10,alignItems:"center",borderRadius:20,marginTop:30}}>
                <TextInput secureTextEntry={true}  style={{fontSize:19,justifyContent:"center"}} placeholder="Password" />
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row",margin:10}}>
            <TouchableOpacity>
                <View style={{marginTop:20,margin:5,borderRadius:10,borderWidth:1,padding:10,width:140,backgroundColor:"#7400FF"}}>
                    <Text style={{justifyContent:"center",marginLeft:30,fontSize:22,color:"white",borderColor:"#3E0583",fontWeight:"bold"}}>Login</Text>
                </View>
            </TouchableOpacity>
            <TouchableOpacity onPress={()=>{navigation.navigate("SignUp")}}>
                <View style={{marginTop:20,margin:5,borderRadius:10,borderWidth:1,padding:10,width:140,backgroundColor:"yellow"}}>
                    <Text style={{justifyContent:"center",marginLeft:30,fontSize:22,color:"#430064",fontWeight:"bold"}}>SignUp</Text>
                </View>
            </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
         
         </>
    )
}

export default index

const styles = StyleSheet.create({})
